about_the_game:
Uncover secrets hidden in a relic of the digital age.

You’ve acquired a mysterious PalmPilot from the notorious Crypt Killer—the smartest serial killer of the century. Somewhere in this device lies the key to unraveling his confession. But it won’t be easy. You’ll need to crack codes, solve cryptic riddles, and learn real-world decryption techniques in this immersive and challenging detective game.

Are you ready to unlock the truth?

From the creator of OS simulation titles like 128k, DISOWN95, After Hours, and Atom☭grad.

Features

  • Authentic PalmPilot Simulation: Explore the quirks and charms of this iconic device, re-created with loving attention to detail.

  • Puzzles with Depth: Engage with brain-teasing challenges that blend logic, intuition, and real cryptographic concepts.

  • Retro Nostalgia: Relive the magic of 2000s tech, complete with classic games, vintage apps, and handwriting recognition. Prefer your keyboard? That works too!

What is the PalmPilot?

The PalmPilot was a revolutionary personal digital assistant (PDA) released in the late 1990s and early 2000s. Designed for managing contacts, calendars, and notes, it became a favorite of tech enthusiasts for its portability, handwriting recognition, and early mobile games. In many ways, it was the first glimpse at the modern smartphone—just without the phone.

I used to play with my dad’s PalmPilot all the time, and I recently found it in a storage unit. What do you know—after 20 years, it still had battery left! I turned it on and knew right away that I wanted to use it for a computer simulation. Palm Cracker is the result!

Is the game really free?

Yes! Palm Cracker is 100% free to play, own, and beat. There are no hidden fees or in-app purchases.

Wishlist now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: Delve into a gripping world of puzzles, true ciphers on an old PalmPilot system. Will you uncover the Crypt Killer’s confession and bring him to justice, or will he escape the law?
